title: Council announces major investment plans for sheltered homes (Stroud District Council)
text: ( Source : Stroud District Council ) Release Date : 13 October 2015 Stroud District Council's housing committee has voted to invest almost Â£5 million in its homes for the elderly. It follows an independent report, commissioned by the council,
